shortFormCopy.socialMediaBio: I build digital platforms that you own. 10 years of web development. Based in Las Vegas. Let's build something.
shortFormCopy.elevatorPitch: I'm a web developer who builds custom websites and applications. The difference is — when the project is done, you own everything. No monthly fees, no vendor lock-in. I've been doing this for 10 years, so I can build with modern tools while actually understanding why things work. Most of my clients are business owners who are tired of renting their digital presence and want something built specifically for them.

paragraphs: Most business owners are stuck in a trap: they're paying monthly fees for website builders, but they don't actually own anything. If the company shuts down or raises prices, they're starting over.
I build a different way. When your project is complete, you get the keys to everything — the code, the hosting, the whole platform. It's yours. No monthly rent, no lock-in.

I've been writing code for 10 years. That means I can leverage modern AI tools for speed, but I also understand the fundamentals well enough to fix things when they break. You get the best of both worlds: fast development and reliable infrastructure.
If you're ready to stop renting and start owning, let's talk.
